20 #ifndef _CLIENT_H
21 #define _CLIENT_H
22 #define CLIENT_FEATURES_CHAT (1<<1)
23 #define CLIENT_FEATURES_AWARENESS (1<<2)
24 #define CLIENT_FEATURES_EVENTS (1<<3)
25 #define CLIENT_FEATURES_MOVE (1<<4)
26 #define CLIENT_FEATURES_ALL (1<<30)-1
27 #define CLIENT_STATUS_CONNECTED 1
28 #define CLIENT_STATUS_ACTIVE(s) ((s & CLIENT_FEATURES_CHAT)||(s&CLIENT_FEATURES_AWARENESS))
29 #endif
